briefdescription.para: Item path used to access path in the tree, see QgsDataItem::mPath.
Item comment.
Custom sort role, see QgsDataItem::sortKey()
Constructor for QgsBrowserModel, with the specified parent object.

simplesect.para: QgsBrowserModel models are not initially populated and use a deferred initialization approach. After constructing a QgsBrowserModel, a call must be made to initialize() in order to populate the model.

detaileddescription.para:
Deprecated
Deprecated since QGIS 3.4 this method has no effect, and is dangerous to call in earlier QGIS versions.Any usage should be removed (and will have no harmful side-effects!).

briefdescription.para: Returns the data item at the specified index, or a nullptr if no item exists at the index.
Returns a map of the root drive items shown in the browser.

detaileddescription.para: These correspond to the top-level directory items shown, e.g. on Windows the C:\, D:\, etc, and on Linux the "/" root directory.

memberdef.argsstring: (const QMimeData *data, Qt::DropAction action, int row, int column, const QModelIndex &parent) override
memberdef.name: dropMimeData

briefdescription.para: Returns the model index corresponding to the specified data item.

detaileddescription.para: If the item was not found, an invalid QModelIndex is returned.
If the parent item is argument is specified, then only items which are children of parent are searched. If no parent is specified, then all items within the model are searched.

briefdescription.para: Returns index of item with given path.

detaileddescription.para:
It only searches in currently fetched items, i.e. it does not fetch children.
path
item path
matchFlag
supported is Qt::MatchExactly and Qt::MatchStartsWith which has reverse meaning, i.e. find item with the longest match from start with path (to get as close/deep as possible to deleted item).
model index, invalid if item not found

briefdescription.para: Returns index of layer item with given uri.

detaileddescription.para:
It only searches in currently fetched items, i.e. it does not fetch children.
uri
item uri
index
the current index of the parent (to search for children)
model index, invalid if item not found
QGIS 3.6

memberdef.argsstring: (int section, Qt::Orientation orientation, int role=Qt::DisplayRole) const override

memberdef.argsstring: (int row, int column, const QModelIndex &parent=QModelIndex()) const override

briefdescription.para: Returns true if the model has been initialized.

memberdef.name: setData

briefdescription.para: Connections changed in the browser, forwarded to the widget and used to notify the provider dialogs of a changed connection.
Emitted when item children fetch was finished.
Adds a directory to the favorites group.

detaileddescription.para: If name is specified, it will be used as the favorite's name. Otherwise the name will be set to match directory.

briefdescription.para: Hide the given path in the browser model.
Delayed initialization, needed because the provider registry must be already populated.
Refreshes the list of drive items, removing any corresponding to removed drives and adding newly added drives.
Reload the whole model.
Removes a favorite directory from its corresponding model index.
Removes a favorite item.
Populates the model.
A model for showing available data sources and other items in a structured tree.

detaileddescription.para: QgsBrowserModel is the foundation for the QGIS browser panel, and includes items for the different data providers and folders accessible to users.

QgsBrowserModel models are not initially populated and use a deferred initialization approach. After constructing a QgsBrowserModel, a call must be made to initialize() in order to populate the model.
